sentences.cn: 发展经济合作,加强贸易往来.

sentences.en: Don't forget to coop the chickens.
He was never happy living at home with his parents, so as soon as possible he flew the coop and got his own place.
sentences.cn: 他跟父母住在一起时从来没开心过, 所以他尽早离开家,有了自己的小窝.

sentences.en: His partner flew the coop with all the money.
sentences.cn: 他的合伙人卷款逃走了.

sentences.en: However, the grades are pretty useless in CS COOP.
sentences.cn: 四年下来, 四五十门课平均超过95分是什么概念,您自个儿掂量吧.

sentences.en: It comprises that heating the air into chicken coop to 70 Deg.
sentences.cn: 将消毒空气通入农用薄膜全封闭的鸡舍即可.

sentences.en: It is not healthy for a young guy to stay coop up inside.
sentences.cn: 年轻小伙子关在房间内是无益于健康的.

sentences.en: Litter in the hen coop beds down if it is not raked.
sentences.cn: 鸡笼里的稻草如不清除会形成硬层.

sentences.en: She graduates to senior stylist and then flies the coop to set up in a salon of her own.
sentences.cn: 她晋升为高级发型师，然后又冲破种种限制，开起了自己的发廊。

sentences.en: The chickens have all fled from their coop.
The hen has flown away and the eggs in the coop are broken.
The standard section lifted in the suspension coop can't surpass 2.
sentences.cn: 吊笼内一次提升标准节不得超过两只.

sentences.en: There are two brown rabbits in the coop.
sentences.cn: 笼子里有两只棕色的兔子.

sentences.en: There was a fox on the prowl near the chicken coop.
sentences.cn: 有只狐狸在鸡舍附近踅来踅去.

sentences.en: Why willingly let the fox into the chicken coop?
sentences.cn: 为什么要把狐狸放进鸡窝?
